short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically play/pause YouTube videos when switching tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Video Pauser is a lightweight, efficient browser extension designed to enhance your YouTube viewing experience. With this tool, your YouTube videos will automatically pause when you switch tabs and resume when you return, saving you time and avoiding interruptions.

Seamless tab management for uninterrupted multitasking.
Easy-to-use, with no configuration needed.
Works perfectly with multiple YouTube tabs.
Install YouTube Video Pauser today to make your YouTube experience smarter and more convenient!
